column4: Is there a way to move these: http://img7.imagebanana.com/img/thfo0aos/Selection_009.png to the other side of the clock? They are the menu bar icons....
I thought that too, but it's not an applet. I get the application menu; RMB - opera = Open new tab etc
I'm not sure then. I know it's like a notification area, but I'm not sure how to move it. It was easy in older editions, but I'm not sure now though.
have you asked the forums yet?
they can pretty help you out of anything and everything.
no, I though I'd come here first, as I had irc open. Then google, then forums :P
hehe, it's always worked for me in the past ;)
how long have you been using Ubuntu?
About six months now, I think.
I just installed 10.04 last night... *sigh* I didn't realize that 10.04 wasn't the latest.
Mm... I'm not sure. I heard it from a friend that 10.04 is better. So... that's what I'm going to stick with.
How better?! imo 11.04 is nice :3. Also, you have the option for the new unity gui, or the old gnome gui. I use gnome cuz I don't like the unity one, but hey :)
